scripts.start-app: cd frontend && pnpm install && pnpm dev
scripts.start-agent: source venv/bin/activate && cd backend && pip install -r requirements.txt && python agent_worker.py start
scripts.start-martha: source venv/bin/activate && cd backend && pip install -r requirements.txt && python martha_agent.py start
scripts.start-snoop: source venv/bin/activate && cd backend && pip install -r requirements.txt && python snoop_agent.py start
scripts.start-dual-agents: pnpm run start-martha & pnpm run start-snoop
